steps.step: {"title": "openMyorder", "description": "打开我的订单", "method": "xpath", "value": "//*[@class='addIcon']||//*[@title='功能列表']||//li[contains(text(),\"我的订单\")]||//span[@class='title' and text()='我的订单']||//span[@title='嵌入']"}
{"title": "orderTypeGeneral", "description": "选择普通订单类型", "method": "xpath", "value": "//div[@class='detail' and text()='限价']/preceding-sibling::div/div[@class='radiobox-insert']"}
{"title": "oderTypeFlexible", "description": "选择弹性订单类型", "method": "xpath", "value": "//div[@class='detail' and text()='弹性']/preceding-sibling::div/div[@class='radiobox-insert']"}
{"title": "oderTypeSZC", "description": "选择市转撤订单类型", "method": "xpath", "value": "//div[@class='detail' and text()='市转撤']/preceding-sibling::div/div[@class='radiobox-insert']"}
{"title": "oderTypeSZX", "description": "选择市转限订单类型", "method": "xpath", "value": "//div[@class='detail' and text()='市转限']/preceding-sibling::div/div[@class='radiobox-insert']"}
{"title": "lspeedClick", "description": "左方下拉清算速度", "method": "xpath", "value": "//div[@class='both-new dir-all']/div[1]/descendant::span[contains(text(),'清算速度')]/following-sibling::button"}
{"title": "rspeedClick", "description": "右方下拉清算速度", "method": "xpath", "value": "//div[@class='both-new dir-all']/div[2]/descendant::span[contains(text(),'清算速度')]/following-sibling::button"}
{"title": "totlAcrdIntrst", "description": "应计利息总额", "method": "xpath", "value": "//div[text()='应计利息总额']/following-sibling::div/span"}
{"title": "closePanel", "description": "关闭我的订单", "method": "xpath", "value": "//span[text()='我的订单']/parent::div//span[@title='关闭']"}
{"title": "unfoldMyOrder", "description": "放大我的订单", "method": "xpath", "value": "//span[@class='title' and text()='我的订单']"}
{"title": "closeImportPanel", "description": "关闭导入页面", "method": "xpath", "value": "//span[text()='我的订单导入']/parent::div//span[@title='关闭']"}
{"title": "totlAcrdIntrst", "description": "应计利息总额", "method": "xpath", "value": "//div[text()='应计利息总额']/following-sibling::div/span"}
{"title": "title", "description": "我的订单导入", "method": "xpath", "value": "//span[text()='我的订单导入']"}
{"title": "inputCode", "description": "筛选区输入债券代码", "method": "xpath", "value": "//input[@placeholder='代码/名称']"}
{"title": "unfoldPost", "description": "放大交易分仓", "method": "xpath", "value": "//span[@class='title' and text()='交易分仓']"}
{"title": "inputCode", "description": "筛选区输入债券代码", "method": "xpath", "value": "//input[@placeholder='代码/名称']||//li[@title='%s']"}
{"title": "partyPost", "description": "点击待本方分仓", "method": "xpath", "value": "//span[text()='待本方分仓']"}
{"title": "tradingNum", "description": "点击成交意向编号", "method": "xpath", "value": "//div[@col-id='trdngIntntnNo' and text()='%s']"}
{"title": "closePanel", "description": "关闭交易分仓", "method": "xpath", "value": "//span[text()='交易分仓']/parent::div//span[@title='关闭']"}
{"title": "CBTQuoteQuery", "description": "打开现券报价信息查询", "method": "xpath", "value": "//li[contains(text(),'报价信息查询')]"}
{"title": "title", "description": "报价查询面板标题", "method": "xpath", "value": "//span[@class='title' and text()='报价信息查询-债券市场']"}
{"title": "codeFilter", "description": "筛选区输入债券代码", "method": "xpath", "value": "//input[@placeholder='代码/名称']||//li[@ng-reflect-title='%s']"}
{"title": "closePanel", "description": "关闭我的订单", "method": "xpath", "value": "//span[text()='报价信息查询-债券市场']/parent::div//span[@title='关闭' and @class='pane-icon icon-close-restore']"}
{"title": "dlCd", "description": "成交编号", "method": "xpath", "value": "//div[@class='itemTitle' and text()='成交编号']/following-sibling::div"}
{"title": "cpInstnCnShrtNm", "description": "对手方机构", "method": "xpath", "value": "//dt[@class='fl detail_tip' and text()='对手方机构']/following-sibling::dd"}
{"title": "cpTrdrNm", "description": "对手方交易员", "method": "xpath", "value": "//dt[@class='fl detail_tip' and text()='对手方交易员']/following-sibling::dd"}
{"title": "nmnlVol", "description": "券面(万)", "method": "xpath", "value": "//dt[@class='fl detail_tip' and text()='券面(万)']/following-sibling::dd"}
{"title": "dlAmnt", "description": "交易金额", "method": "xpath", "value": "//dt[@class='fl detail_tip' and text()='交易金额']/following-sibling::dd"}
{"title": "stlmntDt", "description": "结算日", "method": "xpath", "value": "//dt[@class='fl detail_tip' and text()='结算日']/following-sibling::dd"}
{"title": "stlmntAmnt", "description": "结算金额", "method": "xpath", "value": "//dt[@class='fl detail_tip' and text()='结算金额']/following-sibling::dd"}
{"title": "qtTp", "description": "报价类型", "method": "xpath", "value": "//dt[@class='fl detail_tip' and text()='报价类型']/following-sibling::dd"}
{"title": "clrngMthd", "description": "清算类型", "method": "xpath", "value": "//dt[@class='fl detail_tip' and text()='清算类型']/following-sibling::dd"}
{"title": "dlTm", "description": "成交时间", "method": "xpath", "value": "//dt[@class='fl detail_tip' and text()='成交时间']/following-sibling::dd"}
{"title": "stlmntSpdNm", "description": "清算速度", "method": "xpath", "value": "//dt[@class='fl detail_tip' and text()='清算速度']/following-sibling::dd"}
{"title": "title", "description": "成交查询面板标题", "method": "xpath", "value": "//span[@class='title' and text()='成交查询']"}
{"title": "dealDetail", "description": "成交明细", "method": "xpath", "value": "//span[@title='现券买卖-成交明细']"}
{"title": "preDealIntention", "description": "上市前成交意向", "method": "xpath", "value": "//span[@title='上市前交易意向']"}
{"title": "codeFilter", "description": "筛选区输入债券代码", "method": "xpath", "value": "//input[@placeholder='代码/名称']||//li[contains(@ng-reflect-title,'%s')]"}
{"title": "unconfirmedCounter", "description": "对手方未确认", "method": "xpath", "value": "//span[text()='对手方未确认']"}
{"title": "traderFilter", "description": "筛选区输入本方交易员", "method": "xpath", "value": "//input[@placeholder='本方交易员']||//input[@placeholder='本方交易员']/following-sibling::div/ul/li[2]"}
{"title": "tradeRecordFilter", "description": "筛选区输入交易记录编号", "method": "xpath", "value": "//input[@placeholder='交易记录编号']||//input[@placeholder='交易记录编号']/following-sibling::div/ul/li[2]"}
{"title": "closePanel", "description": "关闭成交查询面板", "method": "xpath", "value": "//span[text()='成交查询']/parent::div//span[@title='关闭' and @class='pane-icon icon-close-restore']"}
{"title": "codeInput", "description": "输入订单编号", "method": "xpath", "value": "//div[text()='报价/订单编号']/following-sibling::div//input"}
{"title": "title", "description": "放大面板", "method": "xpath", "value": "//span[@class='title' and text()='现券买卖-综合报价']"}
{"title": "closePanel", "description": "关闭综合报价窗口", "method": "xpath", "value": "//span[text()='现券买卖-综合报价']/parent::div//span[@title='关闭']"}
{"title": "codeFilter", "description": "筛选区输入债券代码", "method": "xpath", "value": "//input[@placeholder='代码/名称']||//li[@ng-reflect-title='%s']"}
{"title": "activeBondQt", "description": "打开活跃券报价", "method": "xpath", "value": "//li[contains(text(),'活跃券报价')]"}
{"title": "title", "description": "活跃券报价标题", "method": "xpath", "value": "//span[@class='title' and text()='活跃券报价']"}
{"title": "nmnlVol", "description": "可成交券面总额", "method": "xpath", "value": "//span[contains(text(),'可成交券面')]//span"}
